name: Zaria (Folvos_Arylide)
description:
Unfortunately due to RL commitments the game is unfinished for the JAM so now it's a glorified art showcase.

Click one of the movement cards then WASD to move.

Adventure tag for the mythical biblically accurate D20.
$10 if you can find it (That's a lie).

ORIGINAL IDEA:
The game was originally going to be a sort of survival strategy game with a dice rolling mechanic. The value on the dice will determine your starting health, the amount of actions you can perform, etc. You move around the dungeon rooms, thinking of ways to avoid or deal with the dice enemies as you explore..
